CustomField.formula: IF (AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Filing"), AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"),ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Source__c,"Other Party Paper"))),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"In Clause Approval"))), IF(OR($User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4d', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4t'), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__ActivateAgreement?id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Activate", "Activate"),"_self") , HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__AgreementActivate?id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Activate", "Activate"),"_self")),NULL)
CustomField.label: Activate
